humanReadableAbi: event ActivityRegistered(uint16 activityId, uint16 companyId, string activity, address actor, uint256 timestamp)
event CompanyRegistered(uint16 companyId, bytes32 name, bool isManufacture, bool isIntermediate, bool isEndPoint, bool active)
function addCompany(bytes32 name, tuple(bool isManufacture, bool isIntermediate, bool isEndPoint) companyType)
function addLot(uint16[] productIds, uint16 manufacturerId, uint32 quantity)
function catalogs(uint16) view returns (uint16 catalogId, uint16 companyId, bytes32 productName, bool active)
function companies(uint16) view returns (uint16 companyId, bytes32 name, tuple(bool isManufacture, bool isIntermediate, bool isEndPoint) companyType, bool active)
function editCompanyType(uint16 companyId, tuple(bool isManufacture, bool isIntermediate, bool isEndPoint) companyType)
function editLot(uint16 lotId, uint16[] newProductIds, uint32 newQuantity)
function lotActivities(uint16) view returns (uint16 activityId, uint16 lotId, string activity, address actor, uint256 started_at, bool finished, uint256 finished_at)
function lots(uint16) view returns (uint16 lotId, uint16 manufacturerId, uint32 quantity, bool confirmed, bool active)
function products(uint16) view returns (uint16 productId, uint16 catalogId)
